actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the establishment of enterprise zones, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Rural Business Revitalization Act of 1990 - Title I: Designation of Rural Enterprise Zones - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to designate rural enterprise zones for purposes of providing tax and regulatory relief and improving local services. Requires the Secretary to report to the Congress on an evaluation of this Act every three years. Title II: Federal Income Tax Incentives - Allows a general business credit for rural enterprise zone employment and allows an investment tax credit for rural enterprise zone property. Increases the research tax credit for research conducted in rural enterprise zones.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the establishment of enterprise zones, and for other purposes.
